transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haanji. Hello?
Customer: Hello. Namaskar.
Executive: Is this Tanu?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, is this Tanu speaking? From IndiaMART?
Customer: Yes. Yes.
Executive: Hello, can you hear me?
Customer: Yeah, I can hear you. Hello.
Executive: Yeah, yeah, I got your number directly from the IndiaMART app.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Yeah, you are, you are, I think you are the current assigned account manager for my company.
Executive: So can you please confirm your company name?
Customer: Sorry, your voice is not audible. It's breaking or [unintelligible].
Executive: Confirm your company name, sir.
Customer: HK Merchandise.
Executive: HK?
Customer: HK Merchandise, HK.
Executive: Okay, yes sir, please tell me.
Customer: Yeah, see, I'm, we are going, I mean, we just got a call from Zoho. We are integrating Zoho towards the company. So we got a call from them just now regarding the integration of IndiaMART to the Zoho CRM.
Executive: So, uh, you want to, uh, you got CRM tool of Zoho?
Customer: Yeah, yeah, Zoho, ma'am, your voice is not clear, ma'am. There is some disturbance.
Executive: Okay, just one minute, just, you know, I will call you directly on your number. Just allow me.
Customer: Yeah, yeah, please, please, please.
Customer: I hope I'm not disturbing you.
Executive: No, no, no, I will connect you just, give me five.
Customer: No problem. If you are, if you are busy, we can connect tomorrow morning also, no problem. Okay? I just wanted to collect the feedback so that I implement the information tomorrow, that's why.
Executive: Okay, no issue. We will connect tomorrow at 9:10 a.m. Okay?
Customer: Yeah, yeah. No problem. Tomorrow morning we'll connect. Thank you.
Executive: Your good name?
Executive: Yeah, Tanu.
Customer: You said Tanu.
Executive: Tanu, okay, okay. Yeah, same person. Yeah, yeah, okay, okay, then. We'll connect on the same number. Thank you. Bye.
Executive: Yeah, sure, sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to integrate IndiaMART with Zoho CRM.

- Voice not clear, disturbance in the call.



Resolution:

- Executive will call back on customer's number.

- Agreed to connect the next day.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back next day at 9:10 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- zoho, crm, integration, call
